name: Pixel Cartel
description:
Fight your way through the streets of Pixelita town and take down the rival cartel gangs.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 40 - The more you have the worse it is.

Blood, Money, Infamy - this is the life you chose.

Controls - WASD or Arrows to move, Mouse to shoot

Edit - Finally got round to uploading a post jam version that fixed a couple of bugs
